response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and functionality. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose a price of $150 for this product. I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if $150 feels too high, please let me know your offer, and we can discuss a mutually beneficial price. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 150}
